Author: ffawnn
Text: Thank you, that’s a good idea. I think I’m just gonna study some more, lol. Tomorrow’s another day and all that

Author: edub12345
Text: My suggestion: do something non-food or exercise related that makes you feel good about yourself and focus on it a lot. I’ve been playing piano since I was little and I know some really pretty songs, and everytime I play I feel a nice sense of pride that I’m able to do that. I’m sure you have little random skills that give you a self esteem boost every now and then ❤️   The feeling you’re feeling is something every one of us experiences time to time.. just remind yourself that eventually you will be in a place where you’re feeling confident and on track again, just try to use something else to take your mind off of it in the meantime.
